snippet.title: Dolmen Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2021
snippet.description: Here's a gameplay trailer for Dolmen, the upcoming cosmic horror adventure from Massive Work Studio. Dolmen is launching on PC, Xbox and PlayStation in 2022.
